For my assignment I will be build and evaluate a regression model that predicts car fuel efficiency.



Loading in the dataset

```{r}
data(mtcars)
```


Exploratory Data Analysis

```{r}
summary(mtcars)
cor(mtcars[, c("mpg", "wt", "hp")])
pairs(mtcars[, c("mpg", "wt", "hp")])


```


Building regression model
```{r}
model <- lm(mpg ~ wt + hp, data = mtcars)
summary(model)
```


Evaluating residuals
```{r}
par(mfrow = c(2, 2))
plot(model)
par(mfrow = c(1, 1))
```



Making a prediction

```{r}
new_car <- data.frame(wt = 3.0, hp = 150)
predict(model, new_car)
```
